OrgName: Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc. d/b/a PAR, Inc.
activities: Health professionals, such as psychologists or counselors, may utilize PARiConnect, and online assessment platform, to allow patients to respond to assessment tools online.  Or, the practitioner may enter score results to this platform to obtain reports.  Limited elements of demographic data may be entered to generate scores and reports.  Such demographic data may be retained on the electronic platform.  Additionally, Customers may make purchases from PAR, Inc. requiring the use of a credit card on PAR's corporate website (www.parinc.com).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Books & Periodicals - (BOK)Education & Training - (EDS)Health Care Services - (HCS)
personaldata: Customer and client, it does not cover manually processed data
recoursemech: submit complaints to American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
